trans-unit.source: The type of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: Represents a dynamic data collection that provides notifications when items get added, removed, or when the whole list is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 代表在加入和移除項目時，或重新整理整份清單時提供通知的動態資料集合。

trans-unit.source: In many cases the data that you work with is a collection of objects.
trans-unit.target: 在許多情況下您使用的資料是物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, a common scenario in data binding is to use an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> to display a collection of records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在資料繫結的常見案例是使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>顯示記錄的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can enumerate over any collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 您可以實作任何集合上列舉<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>介面。

trans-unit.source: However, to set up dynamic bindings so that insertions or deletions in the collection update the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] automatically, the collection must implement the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> interface.
trans-unit.target: 不過，若要設定動態繫結，以便插入或刪除集合中的更新[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]集合必須實作自動<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged>介面。

trans-unit.source: This interface exposes the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event, an event that should be raised whenever the underlying collection changes.
trans-unit.target: 此介面會公開<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件，應該在每次基礎的集合變更時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> class, which is a built-in implementation of a data collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> interface.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 提供<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>類別，這是資料集合中實作的內建實作<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged>介面。

trans-unit.source: Before implementing your own collection, consider using <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> or one of the existing collection classes, such as <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>, <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601>, among many others.
trans-unit.target: 在實作之前您自己的集合，請考慮使用<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>或其中一個現有的集合類別，例如<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>， <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601>，還有許多其他。

trans-unit.source: If you have an advanced scenario and want to implement your own collection, consider using <xref:System.Collections.IList>, which provides a non-generic collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有進階的案例，而且想要實作您自己的集合，請考慮使用<xref:System.Collections.IList>，這樣會提供可依索引個別存取的物件的非泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: Implementing <xref:System.Collections.IList> provides the best performance with the data binding engine.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>與資料繫結引擎可提供最佳效能。

trans-unit.source: To fully support transferring data values from binding source objects to binding targets, each object in your collection that supports bindable properties must implement an appropriate property changed notification mechanism such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要完全支援的來源物件繫結至繫結目標傳輸的資料值，您支援可繫結屬性的集合中每個物件必須實作適當的屬性已變更通知機制這類<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>介面。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "Binding to Collections" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 繫結集合 」[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Notes on XAML Usage
trans-unit.target: 附註的 XAML 用法

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> can be used as a XAML object element in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], in versions 3.0 and 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> 可用來當作中的 XAML 物件項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]、 3.0 和 3.5 版中。

trans-unit.source: However, the usage has substantial limitations.
trans-unit.target: 不過，使用方式有許多限制。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> must be the root element, because the that must be used to specify the constrained type of the generic <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> is only supported on the object element for the root element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> 必須是根項目，必須用來指定受條件約束的泛型類型，因為<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>才支援物件項目的根項目。

trans-unit.source: You must declare an (which entails that the build action for this XAML file must be `Page` or some other build action that compiles the XAML).
trans-unit.target: 您必須宣告 (必須是此 XAML 檔案的建置動作的需要`Page`或某些其他組建會編譯 XAML 的動作)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> is in a namespace and assembly that are not initially mapped to the default XML namespace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> 為命名空間和組件，一開始未對應的預設 XML 命名空間中。

trans-unit.source: You must map a prefix for the namespace and assembly, and then use that prefix on the object element tag for <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須將對應的前置詞的命名空間和組件，並再使用該前置詞上的物件項目標記<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: A more straightforward way to use <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> capabilities from XAML in an application is to declare your own non-generic custom collection class that derives from <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>, and constrains it to a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用較簡單的方式<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>從 XAML 應用程式中的功能是以宣告您自己的自訂集合的非泛型類別衍生自<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>，並導致它始終受限為特定類型。

trans-unit.source: Then map the assembly that contains this class, and reference it as an object element in your XAML.
trans-unit.target: 然後將對應的組件，其中包含這個類別，並參考它以在 XAML 物件項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The collection from which the elements are copied.
trans-unit.target: 複製項目的來源集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1" /> class that contains elements copied from the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個類別包含自指定之集合複製過來的項目。

trans-unit.source: The elements are copied onto the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> in the same order they are read by the enumerator of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將元素複製到<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>讀取集合的列舉值的順序相同。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="collection" /> parameter cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="collection" /> 參數不可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The list from which the elements are copied.
trans-unit.target: 複製項目的來源清單。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1" /> class that contains elements copied from the specified list.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1" /> 類別的新執行個體，其包含自指定清單複製過來的項目。

trans-unit.source: The elements are copied onto the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> in the same order they are read by the enumerator of the list.
trans-unit.target: 將元素複製到<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>讀取清單的列舉值的順序相同。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="list" /> parameter cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="list" /> 參數不可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Disallows reentrant attempts to change this collection.
trans-unit.target: 不允許變更這個集合的可重新進入嘗試。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> object that can be used to dispose of the object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> 物件，可用來處置物件。

trans-unit.source: The typical usage is to wrap an <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.OnCollectionChanged%2A> call within a `using` scope, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 通常是用來包裝<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.OnCollectionChanged%2A>內呼叫`using`範圍，如下列範例所示：

trans-unit.source: Checks for reentrant attempts to change this collection.
trans-unit.target: 檢查變更這個集合的可重新進入嘗試。

trans-unit.source: If there was a call to <see cref="M:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.BlockReentrancy" /> of which the <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> return value has not yet been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 如果有 <see cref="M:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.BlockReentrancy" /> 的呼叫，而其 <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> 傳回值尚未處置時。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this means when there are additional attempts to change this collection during a <see cref="E:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 通常這表示，在 <see cref="E:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.CollectionChanged" /> 事件期間有變更這個集合的其他嘗試時。

trans-unit.source: However, it depends on when derived classes choose to call <see cref="M:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.BlockReentrancy" />.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這取決於衍生類別選擇呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.BlockReentrancy" /> 的時機。

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除集合的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when the list is being cleared.
trans-unit.target: 清除清單時，基底類別會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會引發<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.ClearItems%2A>方法<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is added, removed, changed, moved, or the entire list is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 在加入、移除、變更或移動項目者或重新整理整個清單時發生。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <c>item</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 應該插入 <c>item</c> 之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The object to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的物件。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將項目插入至索引中的指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 項目加入至集合時，基底類別會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會引發<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.InsertItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.InsertItem%2A>方法<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index specifying the location of the item to be moved.
trans-unit.target: 指定要移動項目的目標位置之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index specifying the new location of the item.
trans-unit.target: 指定項目的新位置之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Moves the item at the specified index to a new location in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定索引處的項目移至集合中的新位置。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses can override the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.MoveItem%2A> method to provide custom behavior for this method.
trans-unit.target: 子類別可以覆寫<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.MoveItem%2A>方法以提供自訂行為，此方法。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index specifying the location of the item to be moved.
trans-unit.target: 指定要移動項目的目標位置之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index specifying the new location of the item.
trans-unit.target: 指定項目的新位置之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Moves the item at the specified index to a new location in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定索引處的項目移至集合中的新位置。

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會引發<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses can override this protected method to provide custom behavior for the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.Move%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 子類別可以覆寫這個受保護的方法，以提供的自訂行為<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.Move%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Arguments of the event being raised.
trans-unit.target: 所引發事件的引數。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.CollectionChanged" /> event with the provided arguments.
trans-unit.target: 使用所提供的引數來引發 <see cref="E:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.CollectionChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Properties and methods that modify this collection raise the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event through this `virtual` method.
trans-unit.target: 屬性和方法，修改此集合引發<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged>透過此事件`virtual`方法。

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method, either call the base implementation or use the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.BlockReentrancy%2A> method to handle reentrant collection changes, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫這個方法，請呼叫基底實作，或使用<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.BlockReentrancy%2A>方法以處理重新進入的集合變更時，如下列範例所示：

trans-unit.source: Arguments of the event being raised.
trans-unit.target: 所引發事件的引數。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.PropertyChanged" /> event with the provided arguments.
trans-unit.target: 使用所提供的引數來引發 <see cref="E:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.PropertyChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 當屬性值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to remove.
trans-unit.target: 移除項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the item at the specified index of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除集合指定索引位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合移除某個項目時，基底類別會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會引發<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.RemoveItem%2A>方法<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to replace.
trans-unit.target: 要取代的項目之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The new value for the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定之索引處的項目新值。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取代指定之索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: The base class calls this method when an item is set in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中設定項目時，基底類別會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會引發<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%2A>方法<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>基底類別。
